9c68f7de6;XD-745 & XD-745 Use Spring batch admin - Added spring batch admin manager dependency (1.3.0.BUILD-SNAPSHOT) - Added BatchJobController & BatchJobExecutionController  - Currently these controllers have list JobInfo/JobExecutionInfo  - Map the requests to '/batch' to avoid conflicts with existing    XD JobController  - Created BatchJobLocator that extends ListableJobLocator   - This will store job name & isIncrementable value for the job  - Added DistributedJobService that extends batch SimpleJobService    with unsupported methods that depend on runtime Job instance query    from JobLocator - Started HSQLDB in server mode  - This will enable accessing the schema outside the JVM it is running  - Removed the global bean config batch.xml and created batch config    for AdminServer & ContainerLauncher  - Added hsqldb.properties in config to set hsqldb related properties

01253b18c;XD-7 - Tuple data structure Change to use primitive types instead of Wrapper types for byte, short, int, long, float, double, char and boolean.  This avoid NPE from when doing int i = tuple.getInt("fieldWithNullValue").  Non primitive types will return null (BigDecimal, Date, String)
M	spring-xd-tuple/src/main/java/org/springframework/xd/tuple/DefaultTuple.java
M	spring-xd-tuple/src/main/java/org/springframework/xd/tuple/Tuple.java
M	spring-xd-tuple/src/test/java/org/springframework/xd/tuple/DefaultTupleTests.java

47d1cc920;XD-7 - Tuple data structure The initial commit was designed to be backwards compatible with Spring Batch's FieldSet class.  Some differences, it does allow for non-String values and conversions from Strings to rich types are done through Spring ConversionService.  There are several TODOs in the code that need to be revisted on a subsquent iteration.  Some open questions are handling of null and default values.  Test code from Spring Batch's was ported over to help ensure backwards compatibility.
